name: Success Story - How TechCorp Increased Sales by 300%
description: Knowledge sharing video about a customer success story

requirements.audience: SaaS founders and sales teams looking to improve their conversion rates
requirements.cta: Download our free conversion optimization playbook used by TechCorp
requirements.main_problem: SaaS companies struggle with low conversion rates and don't know which strategies actually work to increase sales

type3_requirements.success_story: TechCorp, a mid-size B2B SaaS company, increased their sales by 300% in 6 months by implementing our proven conversion optimization framework. They went from 50 to 200 new customers per month while reducing their customer acquisition cost by 40%.
type3_requirements.key_learnings: 1. Focus on product-qualified leads instead of marketing-qualified leads 2. Implement progressive onboarding with value demonstration at each step 3. Use behavioral triggers for sales outreach timing 4. Create specific landing pages for each customer segment 5. A/B test pricing presentation methods
type3_requirements.target_outcomes: Viewers will understand how to identify their highest-value prospects, implement behavioral triggers for better sales timing, and create segment-specific conversion strategies that can dramatically improve their sales results
